group.group_content:
The workplace in America is currently undergoing a tremendous change. In the past, employees were expected to wear formal clothes – suites for men and dresses or skirts for women. But in the past decade, there has been a clear shift to more casual (1)……… in the workplace.

This change is most evident in the Silicon Valley region of California, where computer programmers are famous for wearing blue jeans, T-shirts, and even shorts to work.

Many companies and their employees have (2)………, creating a style called “Business casual” where employees must dress nicely but are not (3)……… to be overly formal unless they are meeting clients or attending to other important business.

It is this firm’s opinion that our clients avoid the Initial Public Offering (IPO) of the Omega Corporation. There are too many (1)……… questions concerning the business model of Omega, so it unknown whether the company will be successful in the long term. Considering that there are three known cases of scientists at Omega (2)……… their research in the company’s core sectors, we feel that they are not worthy of trust. Reliable sources indicate that the government is preparing to (3)……… a lawsuit against the company. If this lawsuit should go through, there is no doubt in our minds that the company will declare bankruptcy. In short, it would be folly to invest any money in this corporation.

Thanks to the Internet, the way in which business gets conducted is changing rapidly. Even though the Internet boom of the nineties, which resulted in sky-high stock (1)………, has long ended, most businesses realize that their future lies with the Internet. Ten years ago, a large (2)……… of companies didn’t even have web pages. Now, businesses ignore the Internet at their own peril. They have also realized that the key to increasing profits is establishing a presence on the Internet. Those who (3)……… do so will find themselves the leaders in their fields.

Before construction companies are permitted to build new homes, they are required to receive various building permits. There are certain procedures they must follow in order to be (1)……… these permits.
Builders must first submit the architect’s design for the new home to the proper authority. Once these plans are approved, the builder must then apply for a number of various licensees and safety permits. Only after all of these have been granted will the builder be given (2)……… to begin.
While this process may seem excessive, it ensures that only the safest possible homes are constructed, (3)……… protecting the future owners of these homes.
